channel.title: Space Wurm vs. Moonicorn (Jan/Feb)
channel.description:
**Game Facilitator: Tyler Lominack** I will be running eight sessions of *Space Wurm vs. Moonicorn*, by Johnstone Metzger, on Wednesdays in Jan and Feb at 8:00 pm (Eastern) on Wednesdays. These will be 3 hours sessions. This will be for 5 players. Attendance in all is ideal, but not required.
Surrounded by their devoted friends and perfidious foes, Space Wurm and Moonicorn wrestle over the fate of the galaxy. Will Space Wurm's iron coils close around the hearts of man forever? Or will Moonicorn's beacon shine a light of freedom and joy across the Universe? Battle lines are being drawn and the fate of the Galaxy is in your hands!
We will have a tone and content discussion, we will use Lines and Veils, and the X-Card will be in play. I will be using the Quick Play rules. We will do a world build and character generation in the first session.
Here's a song to get you in the mood: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=17o1OlroNSE
S1 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-TnnrQJP3Wl1AVueE S2 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-U-7Y4vSeVj_SvQCS S3 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-U9CgxG1y4iCtLpMw S4 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-UJ3DEinY9NnChtlL S5 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-V6rKzGNYl6ZNBO6m S6 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-VFDI4VKeZvuijf1Z S7 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-VTm85FEWD0B0LRq4 S8 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MO-VaWYd9yHnfmKqIv_

Game Facilitator: Tyler Lominack
I will be running eight sessions of Space Wurm vs. Moonicorn, by Johnstone Metzger, on Wednesdays in Jan and Feb at 8:00 pm (Eastern) on Wednesdays. These will be 3 hours sessions. This will be for 5 players. Attendance in all is ideal, but not required.
